snippet: After recent moves failed to lift viewership, executives of the cable news pioneer are said to be under intense pressure from corporate leaders at Time Warner to turn things around.
abstract: Executives of cable news pioneer CNN are said to be under intense pressure from corporate leaders at Time Warner to turn things around, after recent moves failed to lift viewership; Nielsen ratings show that April 2012 was the channel's lowest-rated month in 10 years. Photos (M)
lead_paragraph: ''Maybe CNN is just like an emergency room.'' That is what a longtime CNN employee theorized last year, during one of the channel's predictable defeats in the Nielsen ratings.

headline.main: At CNN, Decline in U.S. Ratings Worries the Ranks
